TestCase.name: testInnerJoin1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d AND a = e

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($0, $4))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d AND a = e AND b = d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($0, $4), =($1, $3))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $1), =($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d AND a = e AND a = c

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($0, $4), =($0, $2))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin4
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d AND a = e AND b + 1 = d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$4], e=[$5], f=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), =($0, $5), =($3, $4))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $f3=[+($1, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$4], e=[$5], f=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($5, $4), =($0, $5))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], $f3=[+($1, 1)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithNonEquiCondition1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d AND a > e

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), >($0, $4))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), >($0, $4))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithNonEquiCondition2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d AND a = e AND b > d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($0, $4), >($1, $3))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(>($1, $3), =($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoin_Exist1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM MyTable2 WHERE a = d AND a = e)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoin_Exist2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM MyTable2 WHERE a = d AND a = e AND b = d)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $1), =($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoin_In1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2 WHERE a = e)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(d=[$0]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.a, $1)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]]) })], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoin_In2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2 WHERE a = e AND b = d)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(d=[$0]) LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($cor0.a, $1), =($cor0.b, $0))]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]]) })], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $1), =($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoinWithNonEquiCondition_Exist1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM MyTable2 WHERE a = d AND a > e)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), >($0, $4))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoinWithNonEquiCondition_Exist2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM MyTable2 WHERE a = d AND a = e AND b > d)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(>($1, $3), =($3, $4), =($0, $3))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoinWithNonEquiCondition_In1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2 WHERE a > e)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(d=[$0]) LogicalFilter(condition=[>($cor0.a, $1)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]]) })], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), >($0, $4))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoinWithNonEquiCondition_In2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM MyTable2 WHERE a > e AND b = d)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(d=[$0]) LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($cor0.a, $1), =($cor0.b, $0))]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]]) })], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(>($0, $4), =($0, $1), =($0, $3))], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f)]]])
